verses.roman:
rāmacandra-purīke sabāya deya tiraskāra
'ei pāpiṣṭha āsi' prāṇa la-ila sabāra'

synonyms: rāmacandra-purīke—unto Rāmacandra Purī; sabāya—all the devotees; deya tiraskāra—offer chastisement; ei pāpiṣṭha—this sinful man; āsi'-coming; prāṇa—life; la-ila—has taken; sabāra—of everyone.
translation: All the devotees condemned Rāmacandra Purī, saying,"This sinful man has come here and taken our lives."
